entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
